Extract the estimated mean parameters.

Source: R/getter_params.R
get_mean.Rd

Returns a dataframe KxT with the estimated mean paramaters mu_kt per clone k and dimension t.

Usage

get_mean(x)

Arguments

x

a mvnmm object.

Value

dataframe of mean parameters.

Examples

get_mean(x)
#>      cov_early.L2 cov_early.L1 cov_early.L4 cov_early.L3 cov_mid.L2 cov_mid.L1
